title: Refrigerator, Modern Open Floor Plans, Custom Accent Wall Upon Request
posting_body: Named for Alan Turing, the five-story Turing is The Fields’ first community, offering studio, one, two, and three-bedroom residences that blend sophistication with striking modernity.
With premium finishes and wide-open spaces, each floor plan brings you unparalleled luxury without sacrificing on comfort.
